snippet: Israel should not follow the disastrous recommendations of a government-appointed commission, including approving scores of new Israeli settlements in the West Bank.
abstract: Editorial criticizes the report issued by an Israeli government-appointed commission asserting that the country's 45-year presence in the West Bank is not an occupation; urges Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu to reject the commission's recommendations, which would damage Israel's security and regional peace.
lead_paragraph: Israel should not follow the disastrous recommendations of a government-appointed commission, including approving scores of new Israeli settlements in the West Bank.

headline.seo: Wrong Time for New Settlements in the West Bank
